name: Underground Passage
short_description: The damp stone passage echos with a constant dripping noise.
long_description: The damp stone passage is dim save for a few cracks in the ceiling letting in the day's sunlight. A constant dripping sound echos throughout the passage.

trapdoor.description: An old wooden trapdoor with an iron handle accessible by a series of stone steps. It is rusted and cracked with age.

rusty sword.description: The remains of what was once likely a beautiful sword, rusted with age. The metal is engraved with strange symbols.
